properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Ee Baba pokea sadaka
yetu tunayokutolea
Hiyo ni kazi ya mikono
yetu wanadamu). x2
(Twakuomba uipokee,
ee Bwana uibariki
Bwana sadaka
hii tunayokutolea). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mkate pia divai tunakutolea,
upokee utakase na ubariki.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Na mazao ya mashamba
Baba upokee.
Ni zawadi ya mavuno
kwa mikono yetu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nyoyo zetu tunakupa
zote mali yako.
Na fedha zetu tunaleta,
Baba zipokee.
